name: Silverlight
book: Pathfinder Chronicles: Guide to the River Kingdoms © 2010, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: As daylight, except the object touched sheds bright silvery light in a 20-foot radius. In addition to providing illumination, the area of bright light is painful to creatures that are susceptible to alchemical silver. A creature with DR/silver that begins its turn within the light of this spell is automatically dazzled and becomes sickened unless it succeeds on a Fortitude save. These effects disappear 1 round after the target leaves the silverlight. A creature that leaves the area and then returns must make a new saving throw. This spell provides dim light up to 40 feet away, but only creatures within 20 feet are subject to the above effects.
savingThrow_zh: 强韧，通过则部分生效 (见下)
text_zh: 如同昼明术(daylight)，除了这件物体会流洩出半径20呎的明亮银色光芒。除了提供照明外，对那些容易因为炼银(alchemical silver)而受伤的生物来说，处在强光区域(the area of bright light)内会带来痛苦。一名生物(拥有DR/银)在他的回合开始时，如果位于本法术的光照之下，那么自动目眩(dazzled)并且恶心(sickened)，除非它通过强韧豁免检定。在目标离开银光照亮的区域后，此效果会在一轮后消失。离开又返回此区域的生物必须进行一次新的豁免检定。本法术给予最多40呎远的昏暗光线(dim light)，但唯有20呎范围内的生物会接收到此效果。
